name: Command
description: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. Many common commands are detailed below. If the target can't follow your command, the spell ends. • **Approach.** The target moves toward you by the safest and shortest available route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you. • **Drop.** The target drops whatever it is holding and ends its turn. • **Flee.** The target spends its turn moving away from you by the safest and shortest available route. • **Grovel.** The target falls prone and then ends its turn. • **Halt.** The target doesn't move and takes no actions. A flying creature stays aloft, provided that it is able to.
higher_levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other.
